text: As a member of the University of East London Estates and Facilities Department I have instructed Asmac on a considerable number of projects at our 3 campuses over the last 5 years. I have found them as a company to be very customer focussed and at all times professional, courteous and extremely knowledgeable in their field. I would have no hesitation whatsoever in highly recommending them to your organisation.
